posts.id: 𝗣𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝟮 𝗨𝗻𝗳𝗶𝗹𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗙𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿 – 𝗯𝗲𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗱 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗳𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿’𝘀 𝗺_64
posts.text: 𝗣𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝟮 𝗨𝗻𝗳𝗶𝗹𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗙𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿 – 𝗯𝗲𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗱 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗳𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿’𝘀 𝗺𝗶𝗻𝗱𝘀𝗲𝘁 “Complaints are free consulting.” When Jeff Bezos started Amazon, he used to sit in on customer service calls. Why? Because every complaint was free feedback to build a better product. Founders: Don’t just chase investors. Chase your customers’ truth—it’s your real funding. hashtag #FounderMindset hashtag #CustomerFirst hashtag #GrowthLessons

posts.id: Starting a short series called-Unfiltered Founder _119
posts.text: Starting a short series called-Unfiltered Founder 🎤 -no buzzwords, just lessons. 𝟯 𝗽𝗼𝘀𝘁𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝟯 𝗱𝗮𝘆𝘀, 𝘀𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗿𝗮𝘄 𝗹𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗼𝗻𝘀 𝘄𝗵𝗶𝗰𝗵 𝗜 𝗵𝗮𝘃𝗲 𝗼𝗯𝘀𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗲𝗱 𝘄𝗵𝗶𝗹𝗲 𝗱𝗲𝗮𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗦𝗠𝗕'𝘀 Everyone loves talking about marketing campaigns. But we often forget — the founder themselves is the biggest campaign. Think about it: When you picture Tesla, you don’t just think of cars. You think of Elon Musk. When you think of Zomato, you don’t just think of food delivery. You think of Deepinder’s bold tweets...and even delivering food himself. Why? Because products build trust. But people (the founders) build recall. Today the strongest brand strategy isn’t just paid ads, billboards. It’s the founder showing up online — sharing their vision, failures, learnings. That’s how strangers become followers, Followers become customers, And customers become loyal fans. hashtag #FounderBranding hashtag #SMBGrowth hashtag #BuildingInPublic

posts.id: When the billboard went upside down… this guy said_226
posts.text: When the billboard went upside down… this guy said, “No problem, I’ll adjust my view.” 😅 Most of us would just laugh and move on… But this guy? He literally flipped his world to match the ad. Now that’s not just dedication - that’s brand engagement at its peak! Good job Goibibo - if your campaign makes people turn upside down (literally), you’ve nailed memorability.

posts.id: The Hidden Thief Called Inflation 10 years ago, my_136
posts.text: The Hidden Thief Called Inflation 10 years ago, my mom used to buy a full bag of groceries for ₹1,000. Today, the same bag costs ₹2,000+. That’s inflation. It doesn’t steal your money directly. It slowly reduces what your money can buy. Let’s put this in perspective: ₹100 in 2005 bought 5 liters of petrol. ₹100 today barely buys 1 liter. So when we keep our money idle in a savings account at 3–4%, and inflation is running at 6–7%, we are actually losing money in real terms. 👉 This is why investing is not a luxury, it’s a necessity. Equity, mutual funds, and other growth assets don’t just grow your money — they protect it from inflation eating away its value. For example: ₹10,000 in a fixed deposit at 5% return for 10 years becomes ~₹16,000. But if inflation is 6%, your real value is only ~₹9,000. You thought you earned, but you actually lost. 💡 Inflation is silent, but powerful. The only defense is to make your money grow faster than prices.

posts.id: ₹400 CRORE… . . . . Yes, you heard that right. ✈️ _98
posts.text: ₹400 CRORE… . . . . Yes, you heard that right. ✈️ IndiGo (InterGlobe Aviation Ltd) saves ₹400 Cr every year with just 2 smart decisions. Not by selling more tickets. Not by flying more routes. But by turning flights around faster and cutting excess weight. Here’s how 👇 1. 10-Minute Turnaround → 200 Extra Flights/Year IndiGo’s secret weapon? Speed. They consistently land 10–15 minutes early. Their crew deboard passengers faster. This allows them to fit in 200 extra flights per year - all with the same fleet. ✅ More time saved = more revenue, without extra cost. 2. No Ovens = 60 Kg Lighter Flights They removed ovens from planes. Why? Each oven weighs 20 kg. Multiply that by 3 per flight = 60 kg saved. This small change leads to ₹2000–₹3000 fuel savings per flight, which adds up to ₹400 Cr annually across all routes. ✅ Less weight = less fuel ✅ Less fuel = more savings 💡 The lesson? You don’t always need to add more. You need to remove smarter. So ask yourself today - ✅ What’s your 10-minute hack? ✅ What’s that you can eliminate? ✅ How much could you gain by doing less? Because in business (and life), Small optimizations create massive outcomes.

posts.id: Great brands don’t just ship products. They ship e_264
posts.text: Great brands don’t just ship products. They ship emotions. Marketers, take notes!!! Every brand jumps on the Rakhi sale bandwagon. Discounts, offers, ads – we’ve all seen it. But BeastLife did something completely different. A protein brand sent out a Rakhi that said “Living the Beast Life” with every order. They sent a feeling. A gesture that screamed branding genius. No ads. No sales pitch. And trust me, I loved the initiative. ✨ Small surprises > Loud campaigns ✨ Thoughtful experiences = Long-term recall ✨ Branding is in the details, always. Gaurav Taneja Raj V. hashtag #Beastlife hashtag #branding hashtag #marketing hashtag #brandrecall

posts.id: One scan and boom — financial regrets unlocked. I _93
posts.text: One scan and boom — financial regrets unlocked. I was about to order the same product I already had — just because of a SALE. That’s when it hit me… When I used cash, I used to think twice before spending. Standing at a shop, I’d literally count the notes and whisper to myself: “Do I really need this?” 🤔 Sometimes even walk away dramatically like it’s a Karan Johar climax. Then came UPI. One scan and swoosh — money gone faster than my Monday motivation. It’s like my bank account is directly connected to Kuber Devta himself. The funny thing? Technology gave me convenience. But it also made me too comfortable spending. Ease of spending isn’t the problem — lack of awareness is. Track it, budget it, own it. Have you also fallen into the “UPI trap”? 👀 hashtag #DigitalSpending hashtag #FintechHumor hashtag #MoneyMindset hashtag #UPI

posts.id: Some friendships are built on trust. Others… on “B_1
posts.text: Some friendships are built on trust. Others… on “Bhai, tag mat kaatna, return karni hai.” Myntra just exposed half our friend circle — and we’re not even mad. This isn’t just a campaign, it’s a mirror. Witty, real, and so on-point.👏 Friendship isn’t measured in years. It’s in the 3 a.m. calls, the shared silence, the unsaid support — and yes, sometimes, in the outfits they never returned. 💛 Happy Friendship Day to the chaos we choose every day & all LinkedIn fam.

posts.id: Ever met a topper CEO? The world is run by: • C st_292
posts.text: Ever met a topper CEO? The world is run by: • C students • Failed employees • And probably people less smart than you Don’t underestimate yourself. Read that again.
